page.title: 02ST JOHN'S C.E. FIRST SCHOOL
page.content: St.John's C.E. First School, Bishops Wood was opened in 1969. At present there are 71 children in the school and three full time staff and one part-time. The children wear red and grey unifoms. Some children travel to school from the surrounding villages in a mini-bus. There are three classes in the school. The atmosphere is a very happy, friendly one. The school is rural and this allows the children to use the local area for walks, projects and so on. Parents often come into school to help with story-time, baking and on visits. Altogether the school is an important part of village life.
